articles.author: Ronny Reyes
articles.title: These 97 people are still being held by Hamas a year after Oct. 7 attacks - New York Post
articles.description: Of the 251 hostages who were kidnapped by Hamas on Oct. 7, 97 remain in Gaza after a year in captivity, including Americans Edan Alexander, Itay Chen, Sagui Dekel Chen, Gad Haggai, Judi Weinstein H…
articles.content:
Thousands of lives were forever altered and upended when Hamas terrorists invaded Israel on Oct. 7, butchering more than 1,200 people and kidnapping 251 others. 
Those hostages whom Hamas abducted a… [+3623 chars]

articles.author: Brian Stelter
articles.title: Stelter warns about the rhetoric coming from Elon Musk at Trump rally - CNN
articles.description: CNN’s Brian Stelter says the rhetoric Elon Musk used during his appearance at a Trump rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, would lead to “dangerous consequences” for America.
articles.content: CNN's Brian Stelter says the rhetoric Elon Musk used during his appearance at a Trump rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, would lead to "dangerous consequences" for America.
